title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5320.16 - Multi-site jackpots
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5320.16 - Multi-site jackpots

State Regulations

When multiple jackpots occur and there is no definitive
way of knowing which jackpot occurred first, such jackpots shall be deemed to
have occurred simultaneously. A gaming facility shall submit procedures for
payment of such jackpot occurrences in its system of internal controls, which
shall be subject to review and approval by the commission. If there is a
communication failure described in subdivision (h) of section
5320.14
of this Part, a winning
player wagering at a non-updated site may also be eligible to win a jackpot
amount. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5320.16

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
